title: OBJ wants Browns to be like Pats, plus rookie minicamp memories with Bryant McFadden
description:
CBS Sports fantasy expert Dave Richard fills in for Will Brinson and is joined by former Steelers cornerback and 2-time Super Bowl Champ Bryant McFadden to break down the latest from around the NFL. Dave and B-Mac discuss Jason Pierre-Paul's prognosis, Dez Bryant's future and Le'Veon Bell's absence from voluntary workouts. The guys also focus on Odell's claim that the Browns could be the next Patriots, as well as what we're able to learn from rookie minicamps in addition to mentoring young players in the league. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
